QuestData.Title: The Conquest of Azshara
QuestData.Description: $n! Was it you who piloted the wind rider who bombed the command center? It was a direct hit!$B$BMy scouts tell me that you gravely wounded Jarrodenus, flight master of the night-elven skychasers and de facto commander of the opposition.$B$BThe opportunity to strike is now - I don't have time to assemble a full assault. Rush the command center building and kill Commander Jarrodenus before his backup arrives. Bring me his head... and Azshara is ours!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: One head stands between us and victory. This is that head.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Commander Jarrodenus in Talrendis Point and collect his head.
